1.content:
You bit your lip, turning to view yourself from a different angle in the antique stand mirror in your room. You pushed your belly out, feeling slightly light headed as you struggled to make it look as round as you could. Taking a deep breath, you relaxed your belly, watching it sink back into its normal flat position. You brought your hands to your stomach, feeling the muscle beneath your skin.

You sighed, turning to look from another direction. Last week you'd stumbled upon a website where the weight gain community was fairly active. It was the first time you'd really realized that you weren't alone in your desires. You'd always wanted to be fat, but everyone else seemed to think that was so horrible. You'd never shared your desires with anyone before, but after seeing that you weren't alone you found yourself intrigued by the community.

Turning away from the mirror, you sat down in the chair at your desk, and turned on you computer.

Nodding your head, you waited patiently for the computer to boot up. You'd built the computer yourself, having always been fairly tech savvy. Though that was probably because your father's interests had rubbed off on you. After all, he had better be into technology since he was a programmer.

Finally, the computer's login screen appeared, and you logged in. The screen was littered with icons for games, though you clicked on the one for internet.

You felt butterflies in your stomach as you logged into the site you'd found and navigated towards your profile. You clicked on the message icon, almost dreading what you were going to see. In an act of stupidity, or bravery, you'd made an account on the site and posted a couple pictures of yourself along with the tag that you were considering gaining weight. You were sure that everyone would laugh at you for wanting to do that, but you hadn't been able to bring yourself to take down the account. However, as you began reading the comments, you found a renewed sense of purpose.

Where you had thought there would be mocking replies to your desires, were instead words of encouragement from numerous people. There were responses telling you good luck on the gain, or that they were willing to help if you needed any encouragement or advice. You were astounded at how many people shared in your desire for you to gain weight, and were encouraging you to do so.

The butterflies gone, you leaned back in your chair, glancing at your flat stomach. You weren't alone. That was obvious now. However, you were still nervous. What if you didn't like it? What if you liked it too much? What would your family say? Or your friends?

Your eyes were drawn to the thin girl in the photos on your account. Her long dark hair framed her thin face, while she had hardly any breasts to speak of. Her belly was smooth and flat, with just a slight hint of muscles beneath the surface. She had the brightest green eyes you'd ever seen, though they looked sad.

You sighed. You knew why, since that was you. Despite everyone telling you that you should be happy you were thin, you weren't. You didn't know from where the desire came, but you always had wanted to be fat. Still, you'd never really had the bravery to pursue that goal before now. Even now that you'd made your decision, you were doubting whether you could go through with it. Part of you wished you could trade places with your sister, Tabitha. She'd always been chubby, so no one seemed to really care that she was starting to plump up more. But you, they would definitely notice. That was the problem with being a thin girl your whole life. If you put on any weight at all, people would notice and say things.

You rubbed your flat belly, wondering what it would be like once it started getting fatter. You were determined to go through with it this time. You'd tried a couple times before to gain weight, but you'd always chickened out the moment you started seeing any chub on your thin frame. This time though, you were going to go through with it. At the very least, you could let yourself get as fat as Tabitha, and then if you didn't like it, it wouldn't be too hard to lose the weight. Plus it wasn't like anyone would really be able to call you fat. Chubby? Yes. But not fat.

You got up, walking back in front of the mirror and looked your small frame over from head to toe. You were the shortest in your family. Even shorter than Tabitha, despite the age difference. Actually, you were probably one of the shortest girls in school at only 4'8". That meant that any weight you gained would be that much easier to notice since it would have a bigger impact on your width.

Glancing at the calendar, you counted the days until school started back up from summer break.

10. 10 days until school started.

Biting your lip again, you tried to think of a reasonable goal for 10 days worth of gain. Previously, you'd actually gained weight fairly quickly since despite your size you had a rather large appetite if you let yourself. It hadn't taken very long for you to gain even a couple of pounds, though you shouldn't count on always being able to gain so quickly. You figured 3 pounds in ten days wouldn't be too bad a goal. Especially if you didn't want everyone noticing your gain right away. If possible, you wanted to delay the questions as long as possible. You had weighed yourself this morning as being 100 pounds, so it should be fairly easy to tell how much weight you gained from this point.

You almost jumped as you phone beeped, and you quickly grabbed it from the desk. It was Jill, one of your best friends, asking if you wanted to go hang out at the mall. You'd have to get dressed first, but it would give you an opportunity for delicious mall food. Though Tabitha had also asked if you wanted to play video games with her today, and that would mean being able to snack as much as you wanted.

11.content:
You felt a pang of guilt as you messaged Jill back, saying you'd be there shortly. You sister had asked you to play games with her first. Though maybe she'd be up to going to the mall too. Her and Jill always got along really well since they were both into the same things, and you might win points with your mother for convincing your sister to leave the house.

Quickly throwing on some clothes, you paused for a minute, feeling how loose they were on you. Shaking your head you, finished getting ready, and knocked on your sister's door before poking your head into the messy room. Tabitha was lounging on her bed with a controller in her hand as she focused on the video game on the screen.

"You come to join me finally," she said, not even taking her eyes off the screen.

"Actually, I was going to ask if you wanted to go to the mall with me and Jill." you started, "I know there was a new game that came out and I was thinking of getting it."

It wasn't entirely a lie. You loved video games almost as much as your sister and Jill. You hadn't planned on getting the game today, but you figured that would be a good excuse to get Tabitha to join you.

She paused the game, turning towards you, "I forgot that came out today. Let me just get some clothes on."

You shut the door as your chubby sister started pulling herself to her feet to get ready, and made your way to the kitchen and grabbed a granola bar while you waited for her. Finishing it quickly, you grabbed another and ate it.

Finally, you heard Tabitha's door close again followed by the heavy foot falls of your chubby sister making her way downstairs. Her shirt was several sizes too small, and it looked like her jeans were digging into her waist uncomfortably, causing a noticeable muffin top. She followed you out into the driveway, where a lone car sat. It was old and worn, but at least it got you were you needed to go.

Both of you hopped in, and you began making your way to the mall, chatting with your sister about video games the whole time. Finally, you arrived and entered the mall at the food court. Instantly you could smell all sorts of savory scents in the air from the numerous restaurants that lined the large atrium.

"Heather! Over Here!" you looked around for the person calling your name, and caught sight of another chubby girl waving at you and bouncing up and down. Her short hair bobbed up and down, and she kept having to push her thick glasses back up on her nose. Her large shirt did little to hide the fact that she was overweight, though it was probably more because it showed one of her favorite video games.

"Hey Tabitha!" Jill said to them as they approached, "What have you been playing lately?"

Tabitha immediately launched into a detailed description of her video game exploits as they started walking towards the game store.

You smiled to yourself at the dynamic between those two. They could stay at it all day if you let them, though usually you were just as much involved in the conversation as they were. Still, at least you were able to hang out with both of them. It was a win-win.

It didn't take long before the three of you were striding into the game shop, where a healthy crowd of people were lined up to get the new game that had just released. Most of them were guys, though that didn't bother you too much. You'd always been a little tomboyish.

You found yourself looking over the crowd of people as you got in line with your friend and sister. Your eyes lingered on anyone who was overweight, as you wondered what it would be like to be one of them. You had to admit that you were jealous of Jill and Tabitha for their weight. You must look slightly out of place hanging out with the two chubby girls while you were so thin. Though if things went how you planned, you would fit right in with them soon in terms of weight. That thought caused you to blush and fidget nervously, though fortunately no one seemed to notice.

You were only half paying attention to the conversation that Tabitha and Jill were having as you slowly moved forward in line. Fortunately they didn't pay you much mind as you continued fantasizing about what it might be like to be chubby. Though theoretically you wouldn't have to fantasize much longer.

Eventually, it was your turn to pick up the game. You paid the cashier and waited for the other two to finish purchasing their copies.

"So, what should we do now?" Jill asked, coming to stand beside you with Tabitha in tow.

You bit your lip as you tried to think what to do. You were pretty hungry, so maybe a trip to the food court was in order. However, as long as you were here, you also wanted to check out the supplement store for something that the people online said would help increase your appetite. If you were feeling really ambitious about gaining weight, you could always suggest the endless buffet place across the street. Or possibly invite Jill over to play games with you and Tabitha. Or just call it quits for today.

113.content:
Your eyes couldn't help but take in the two chubby girls right in front of you, as you felt another pang of jealousy. You knew that you said you'd take it slow, but you wanted results now. You didn't want to be the skinny girl in the group any longer. You wanted to be one of the chubby girls. With that, you made up your mind.

"I was thinking we could go to the buffet place across the street." you said, already walking towards the exit.

Tabitha and Jill both expressed their excitement as they fell in stride with you as you made your way out into the heat of the noon sun. It only took about five minutes to walk to the buffet, but both your sister and friend were already sounding like they were out of breath by the time you made it to the restaurant. While you weren't free of sweat by any means, the other two seemed as if they'd just done a marathon.

You felt a stirring in your groin as you thought about what it would be like to be that out of shape. Where even a short walk across a parking lot exhausted you. Smiling slightly as you let your eyes linger on the two chubby girls that were accompanying you.

"Why'd you stop? Let's get in there so we can sit down." Tabitha said, leaning on the side of the building while she tried to catch her breath.

Maybe they were fatter than you gave them credit for. Though they were still only chubby by your standards.

You opened the door, letting the two girls enter before you. You loved watching the way their chubby bodies moved, and it was easier to look when you were behind them.

The three of you paid, then took a seat at an empty booth. Your mouth was salivating as you took in more food than you could ever hope to eat. The numerous smells assaulted your nose, begging for your attention as you struggled to decide what to have first.

The three of you separated and began loading up your plates. You licked your lips as you brought your plate back towards the table, determined to eat as much if not more than the other two.

Tabitha sat across from you, while Jill plopped on the bench beside you. You shivered in excitement as you felt her soft thigh press against yours, as your eyes danced between the chubby pair. It was easier to tell now that you were all sitting, but both your companions had definitely put on weight since the start of the summer. Though it seemed like Tabitha was the winner on that front. At the beginning of the summer, Jill had definitely been fatter than Tabitha, but that was no longer the case. Tabitha had to be at least a couple sizes bigger than Jill now.

Not wanting to fall behind in your goal to eat as much as whoever ate the most, you switched your attention to the delicious food. Food always made you feel better, and you always had to be careful not to overindulge, but now you didn't care about that. You'd always had a massive appetite, but you hardly ever pushed yourself. These two though seemed to constantly push their limits as they indulged their desires. This had lead to them having truly massive appetites when they had the opportunity. Still you were going to keep up.

By the time you were on your fourth plate, you were starting to feel like you were going to burst, but the other two just kept going. Still, you weren't going to give up now. You went back and loaded up a fifth plate, and slowly began munching it down while surprisingly only Tabitha went back for a fifth. That meant that Tabitha was the one to match.

When she finished that plate, she let out a loud burp before patting her stuffed belly, "I think I've hit my limit."

"Me too." Jill chimed.

You set your silverware down, looking at your cleared plate, "Me three."

You closed your eyes for a moment, trying to let your stomach settle from the massive meal you'd just ingested. You were pretty sure you were going to puke if you ate another bite.

"Hey, do you two want to go get some ice cream for desert?" Tabitha chimed.

"I'm in if Heather's down." Jill said.

Your stomach turned at the thought, but this might be the perfect opportunity to really push yourself.

Despite how tempting the offer was, you had already promised Tabitha that you'd play with her today. You sent a quick text to Jill that you were busy. Taking one last look in the mirror, you finished getting ready for the day and made your way to your sister's room, knocking as you entered.

The room was a mess, but that didn't bother you too much as you picked your way across the cluttered floor and plopped down on the bed next to your sister. She was still in her too tight pajamas which left her belly visible to anyone who looked at her. She didn't seem to care though as she hardly acknowledged you as she stayed focused on her game. You grabbed a bag of chips and shoved a handful into your mouth as you watched Tabitha's character move about the screen.

You spent the next little while munching on snacks while you waited for Tabitha to finish and play with you. Finally, she set down the controller on her soft belly, glancing at you.

"You ready?" She asked.

You nodded and grabbed the other controller.

The hours crept by as you and your sister played together, munching on snacks the whole time until you heard a knock on the door.

You both turned and looked as your mother poked her head into the room, "Look at this mess! And Tabitha, are you still in your pj's? Why don't both of you go outside and get some sun?"

"It's not like I have anywhere to go." Tabitha shot, "Besides we're spending time together."

You nodded in agreement, as you mother stepped inside the room and put her hands on her hips.

"This is why none of your clothes fit you anymore!" She said, pointing a finger at Tabitha, "And you, you'll end up looking like her if you keep spending all this time on games."

You felt your face go red, and turned away.

"I'm not that fat." Tabitha shot, "besides, what does it matter?"

Your mother let out an angry sigh and left the room, while Tabitha was furiously focusing on the game.

Biting your lip, you turned back towards the game then towards Tabitha, who seemed to purposefully be shoving as much food in her mouth as she could, all the while mumbling under her breath that your mother didn't even know what fat was. She kept going off on how she should show her what fat really was.

Finally, she paused the game and turned to you, "Do you think I'm fat?"

"Where did that come from?" you stutter.

"She's always getting after me for being a little overweight, and honestly, what does it matter? I always get good grades in school, and I help out around the house, so who cares if I spend some time playing video games instead of going outside. I mean, she's not exactly thin either." Tabitha ranted, "I mean who cares if you put on some weight either? She acts like being fat is so horrible. I wish she would just get off my case. It's probably just because I'm the only one of her daughters who's not a twig."

She took a deep breath, looking at her obviously chubby belly as she tried to calm down. You sat in silence, watching your sister kneading her chubby belly, and wishing you could switch her places.

You bit your lip as you mulled over what you sister had said. Your mother definitely didn't get after you or Mary like she did Tabitha. And both you and Mary were fairly thin. This just strengthened your resolve that you needed to gain weight. At least then Tabitha wouldn't be alone in her weight.

"Do you think I should lose weight?" Tabitha finally asked, still staring at her belly.

You were conflicted. On one hand you liked your sister being a little softer, and at least if she was still chubby your mother's ire wouldn't switch solely to you. On the other hand, you could give the socially acceptable response and suggest she lose some weight. Or maybe drop a subtle hint that she should gain more weight, that way you'd still look thin in comparison.

You bit your lip as you tried to decide what to do. On the one hand, you wouldn't mind hanging out with Jill. On the other, it would be nice just to hang out and be lazy all day. Although, there was really no reason you couldn't have both. Jill and Tabitha got along great, and you were sure that Jill wouldn't mind a day of video games if you invited her over.

You quickly texted Jill, asking if she wanted to come over and play video games with you and Tabitha. Almost instantly the phone beeped again with a reply from Jill saying she'd be over soon. You quickly finished getting ready for the day, and made your way towards your sister's room.

You opened the door, peering into the darkened room. The blinds had been drawn shut, keeping it rather dim in the room, and the smell of dirty laundry mingled with that of the snacks that littered the room. Tabitha lay on her bed, her chubby frame illuminated from the light from the television that was displaying her game. You carefully picked your way across the cluttered floor, and sat down on the bed next to your large sister.

"Hey sis. Ready for some games?" She asked, still focused on the screen in front of her.

"Yeah. Hey, I also invited Jill over." you said as you grabbed another controller.

"Sounds good." she said, as she shifted her soft frame over to make more room for you on the bed.

You shifted to a horizontal position next to your sister, feeling her soft body pressed slightly into yours.

Your heart skipped a beat at the feeling of being so close to your sister. You still remembered when she was small enough that your bodies weren't always touching when you were both laying on the bed. Though since she'd been plumping up, the space between you two had grown smaller and smaller until it was nonexistent. Though you didn't mind. You loved feeling your sister's soft body pressing into yours. Even if it was giving you less and less room on the bed. Besides, you should enjoy it while you could. It wouldn't be long before there was too much of the two of you for you both to fit on the bed.

A soft knock sounded at the door as it slowly creaked open, revealing a rather chubby girl poking her head into the room. She looked around before stepping inside and moving towards the chair next to the bed.

"Hey Jill," you said, hardly glancing her way, "You can play next round."

"Alright." she said, plopping down in the chair which groaned in protest of the large teen.

After the round was over, you passed the controller to Jill. You took the opportunity to grab one of the many snacks littering the room and began chowing down on it.

You sighed as you nestled deeper into the bed, pressing ever so slightly more into your sister. You had to admit, it would probably be pretty easy to gain weight if you took a few pages out of your sister's book and just stayed in bed all day playing video games. After all, you did love them almost as much as your sister did. It just seemed like life was always preventing you from constantly indulging yourself. Besides, you didn't necessarily want to get fat that quickly. Although, it might not be too bad if you did.

A few hours went by as the three of you enjoyed time snacking and playing games. Tabitha and Jill had really seemed to master the art of eating while playing as they continued binging on snacks the whole time.

You found yourself thinking back to the beginning of summer break. Both Jill and Tabitha had definitely been thinner before the break started. That wasn't to say that they'd been thin, but they were definitely bigger than at the start. You found yourself jealous of their bodies as you looked over your fat friend and sister. To them they didn't really seem to care that they were overweight. They were completely comfortable just being themselves. And if that meant that they were getting fat, so what. You were just as jealous of that confidence in themselves as you were their bodies.

You got up, excusing yourself from the room as you made your way out into the hall.

You knew they would be able to keep themselves busy for a while. You just were feeling too jealous of them to hang around any longer. You wanted to look like that now! You knew that wasn't possible, but you still couldn't deny that for all your talk of wanting to take it slow you really did want the payoff immediately. You wanted the chair to strain under your weight. You wanted to be so large that you alone could fit on the bed, with no room for someone else. You wanted it.

Still, now the question was; what to do now?

You were lost in thought, letting your feet take you where they willed. You went downstairs, then walked out into the heat of the day. You climbed into your starter car and drove out of the driveway. As you pulled into a parking lot, your eyes lit up at where your body had taken you.

Your mouth began salivating as you looked at the fast food restaurant before you, glad you'd come here. Sure you'd been snacking all day, but you probably should have an actual meal, and it wasn't like the other two would even notice that you were gone.

You proceeded through the drive-through and ordered two large meals. Waiting only a few minutes, you got your food and unwrapped the first large burger as you pulled out of the parking lot. It was so delicious as you bit into it, juices dripping down your chin. You ate ravenously, not even caring how many calories your large meal was adding to your frame. You hadn't even made it home by the time the first meal was gone and you started on the second, but you couldn't help yourself. You just needed to eat and enjoy yourself for a change.

You were sick of always being the thin girl. You wanted what your sister and Jill had. You wanted to be fat. You wanted the confidence to do what you wanted without worrying about whether people saw you as fat. You just couldn't take living the lie any longer.

You took a massive bite of your second burger, almost gagging yourself as you chewed the massive lump of food. You hardly realized that you had pulled into another fast food place and were placing an order until the cashier was collecting your money. You had already finished the second large meal by the time the cashier handed you another bag stuffed full of food. Your car was filled with the delicious scent of the fattening food as you drove away with several fries sticking out of your mouth.

You slowly ate this meal as you made your way back towards your house, starting to feel overly stuffed with food. Yet despite the slightly sick feeling, you felt good being so stuffed with food. There was something comforting about it.

You made your way inside, and back up to your sister's room where the other two were still playing games.

"There you are. Where were you?" Jill asked as you entered the room.

"I needed some fresh air." you replied as you sat down on the bed.

"Well, me and Jill were waiting for you to get back so we could go get some food." Tabitha said, not even taking her eyes off the screen.

Your stomach turned at the thought of more food, but you didn't want to arouse any suspicion from them.

You sat down and started digging in, while the other two continued to wait for their food. Each bite elicited more saliva to fill your mouth as you savored the delicious flavors. You quickly forgot how full you were as you tried to eat as fast as you could.

"Wow! You must have been really hungry." Tabitha said, causing you to jump slightly.

You'd been so focused on your food, that you'd completely forgotten that you weren't alone, "Yeah. I- uh."

You couldn't bring yourself to look at the two chubby girls across from you as you took another bite of your burger, "Do you really think so?"

145111.content:
"The truth is, I, um, actually want to gain some weight." you mumbled, staring at the tray in front of you intently.

You didn't know why you said that. You were still not very comfortable with other people knowing about your secret desires, but something had made you feel the need to tell the two girls on the other side of the table. Perhaps it was the need for it to feel more real. Or just the guilt of keeping it bottled up for so long.

They just looked at you for a moment before Tabitha smiled, "I already knew that."

"Wait, What? How?" you almost shouted.

"You're really not as discrete as you think that you are. Always posing in front of the mirror and playing with your belly." Tabitha said, eating another fry.

"Yeah, even I had my suspicions." Jill said, smiling too.

"Does everyone know?" you asked, feeling your heart sinking.

"I don't think so. I think its just because you hang out with us so often." Jill replied, leaning back on the bench, "Besides, I kind of like being chubby too, so I kind of knew what to look for."

"Wait. You like being chubby?" you asked, feeling genuinely surprised.

Jill chuckled, "Yeah, I've always enjoyed being chubby, even if I did get teased. I love the way my body is, and the way it feels. I don't think I'd ever want to be thin. Not like I'm at risk of that. Honestly, I love being chubby."

You felt more confident in yourself after hearing Jill's confession, and despite your embarrassment, you felt more determined to gain weight than ever before. She wished that she could be as comfortable with being overweight as Jill was.

"Honestly, being chubby really isn't as bad as everyone makes it out to be. I mean, I get to enjoy all the great food that I want, and people don't expect me to do as much work as someone who's skinny." Tabitha chimed in, "And it really doesn't cause me too many problems besides having to buy clothes a bit more often."

"If you want to gain weight, then you should just do it." Jill said honestly, "Otherwise you'll just be unhappy your entire life. Even if you decide to change your mind later, at least you will know what its like."

"But what if people start to notice." You asked.

"They will, but most the time they'll just ignore it. And, what does it matter what some random hater thinks?" Jill said.

You didn't generally like other people to fight your battles, but right now you needed more time to think of how to really get your revenge. Hopefully, this didn't come back to bite you.

Summoning all your effort into trying to cry a little, you looked your mom in the face, "I was defending a girl at school from some bullies and they shoved me, and my jeans got caught on an open locker and ripped, and so the girl let me borrow an extra pair of jeans she had for standing up for her."

You stood there, a single tear rolling down your cheek as you watched your mother, hoping that she would believe you. Tabitha had moved off to the side, and was attempting to keep a straight face at your bold lie. Well it was only partially a lie. You had stood up to some bullies in defense of Lana, but that wasn't how your pants had ripped.

"Oh, I'm so sorry! That was really brave of you to stand up for that girl! Who were the girls?" your mother asked, placing her arm around your shoulder.

You did your best to sound like you were trying not to cry as you responded, "Three girls on the cheerleading squad. I don't know their names though."

"Well, that is unacceptable. Something needs to be done to those girls. I'll call the principal first thing in the morning. And tomorrow after school, we can go to the mall and pick you up some new clothes." She said, leading you into the kitchen where it looked like she was just finishing dinner.

"Alright. I didn't want to get anyone in trouble." you lied, taking your seat at the table as your mother loaded up an unusually large portion of food for you.

"Well. I'm glad that you told me. This needs to be taken care of." She said, placing the plate in front of you, "Now eat up. I'm sure you're hungry, and maybe some delicious pasta will make you feel better."

Tabitha walked past you and loaded up large plate of food before moving to sit down at her spot, as your mother shot her a glare. The food was delicious, and you quickly cleaned your plate and got seconds. You had to do your best to keep a straight face as Tabitha kept looking at you and shaking her head as she snickered to herself. She knew the truth since you'd told her in the car, but she wasn't going to say anything.

After dinner you made your way to your room, grabbing an armful of snacks on your way out of the kitchen. You closed your door behind you as you turned on the TV in your room, and booted up your gaming console. You had finished all of your homework in class, and so you had plenty of time to just relax tonight. You moved in front of your stand mirror, smiling slightly at what you saw.

Your shirt was definitely starting to get tighter on your body, especially with your food baby. The jeans you were wearing still looked massive on you. You shivered despite the warmth in the room as your hand brushed your crotch, the denim teasing your slit. Your other hand tickled your slight double chin, feeling the softness that was starting to form under your face.

You had been so nervous about gaining weight before school started, and honestly, you were still uncertain about how big you wanted to get, but you didn't regret the weight that you'd gained so far. You pushed your belly out, seeing how big you could make it look as your shirt rode up slightly, tightening around your middle. Lana was so big and beautiful in your eyes, but you didn't know if you could bring yourself to get that big. After all, once you were that big it would probably be almost impossible to lose the weight. Still, like Lana, you hadn't really been trying to gain weight as quickly as you were, but mimicking her lifestyle definitely seemed to lead to that result. Honestly, it was starting to become harder not to gain weight as you became lazier and started indulging yourself more often. Maybe you'd just enjoy yourself and see where it took you.

You nodded to yourself, deciding that was what you were going to do. You stripped down to your underwear, taking one last look at your fattening body before moving towards the TV and started gaming. You continued to snack as you played late into the night, before finally retiring to bed. Sinking into a deep sleep in the soft comfort of your mattress, you slept soundly all night. Only waking when your alarm went off.

You stretched, enjoying the soft patter of rain on your window as you lay in bed. You could smell something cooking in the kitchen that made your stomach gurgle in anticipation and your mouth start salivating. You pulled your quilt closer to you, trying to stave off the cool morning air.

After a few minutes you pulled yourself out of bed, and started getting ready for school. Your mother had made another large meal for you, almost insisting that you needed to eat more as she shoved a third plate at you. You weren't sure what had come over her, but you weren't complaining. Finally, you and Tabitha left for school, feeling almost uncomfortably full from your massive breakfast.

"So, you still want to get fatter?" Tabitha asked, looking at her own full belly.

"I think I'm just going to enjoy myself. If that means that I get fat, then okay." you said, glancing at your chubby sister, "Honestly, I don't want to feel like I have to get fat, because then it just becomes a chore."

Tabitha laughed, "You're starting to understand. Most people get fat because they're happy, not because they're trying to get fat."

"Yeah. I think I am starting to get that." you mused.

The two of you rode the rest of the way in relative silence, broken only by the rain on the car and the windshield wipers every few moments. Finding a parking spot near the entrance to the building, you and Tabitha split up to go to your respective classes as you took one last look at the overcast sky before stepping inside where Lana was waiting for you.

"Hey!" she said, walking beside you as you both made your way towards first period.

The hallway was rather crowded as most of the students choose to hang out inside today, and there was a louder than normal buzz as numerous people had conversations with each other. You almost didn't hear the bell to get to class over the hubbub in the school. Still, it wasn't like you were really in a rush since you had plenty of time to get to class.

"I was wondering if you wanted to come over after school." Lana surprised you as you both entered your first class, "I was thinking it was time to show you where I live."

You stopped, looking at Lana for a few moments. You knew that your mother wanted to take you shopping tonight, but you were sure she would understand if you decided to hang out with Lana instead.

"Actually, I was going to ask if you wanted to come clothes shopping with me and my mom after school. I need some new clothes since I've been gaining weight." the words were out of your mouth before you even realized what you were saying.

You felt your face heating up as Lana just looked at you for a second, finally she smiled, "I'd love to!"

"Great! You can just come home with me and Tabitha after school, and I can drop you off at home later." You said, coasting towards your seat with Lana following closely.

"Sounds good." Lana said, plopping heavily into her desk as she tried to adjust her fat to be more comfortable.

The teacher stood up in front of the class and started talking about some theorem or another, though you found it hard to concentrate as he droned on. You were glad the class was a little on the cool side or you might've been tempted to fall asleep as you mulled over what you'd done.

You hadn't planned on asking Lana to join you, but you hadn't wanted to hurt her feelings by declining her offer. You really did need new clothes if the fact that Tabitha's jeans were starting to fit you better was any indication. Still, you probably should've asked your mother if it was okay. You were pretty sure it would be, though you weren't sure how she would react to seeing the size of your new friend. If she thought Tabitha was starting to get fat, then she was going to think she was staring at a whale when she saw Lana. It might scare her into being stricter about trying to stay thin if she thought you might end up like her.

These thoughts continued as your first class ended and you made your way through the noisy halls towards your cooking class. Lana had to push you out of the way of several crowds of people as you walked, hardly paying attention to what was going on around you.

You were glad that the dessert you were making in cooking class proved to be especially difficult since it helped you to keep your mind off of the anxieties that were plaguing you about the future. When you were done, you devoured your dessert, savoring the sweetness as you contemplated what it would be doing to your waistline.

At lunch, you did your best to stuff yourself to your absolute limit, trying to make sure that your belly was nice and stretched for when you went clothes shopping. Hopefully, it would make you seem a few sizes bigger and give you some more time before you had to buy clothes again. Though a lot of that would depend on how quickly you put on weight. It seemed like you were starting to put on weight quicker and quicker lately as you started getting lazier and stuffing yourself more.

The last two classes flew by as the end of the day approached. It was still raining when school let out. You and Lana met up with Tabitha on your way to your car, Lana slowing the group down considerably with her slow pace, though it was getting easier to match her pace and not rush as much. You were glad when Lana and Tabitha discovered that they had a lot in common and started bonding. At Lana's request, the three of you stopped to get some food on the way home. All of you stuffed yourselves on the greasy, fattening food until you were sure that you'd burst if you took another bite.

Finally, it was the moment of truth. You'd texted your mother during lunch to let her know that Lana would be coming with you tonight, and she'd said it was okay. Still, hopefully she didn't act too embarrassing around your massive friend. You closed the car door, and made your way through the cold rain towards the front door. It opened with a click as you stepped inside. You breathed a sigh of relief as you stepped into the warmth of the house, smelling something delicious coming from the kitchen.

Your mother stepped out of the kitchen, taking in the three of you as Lana closed the door behind her, "Oh, you must be Lana! I'm Heather's mom! It's so nice to meet you!"

Lana smiled as your mother strode forward to shake her hand, a warm smile on her face, "Thanks for letting me come."

"Of course. I'm so happy to see Heather making friends. Anyway, I hope your hungry because I thought I'd make us all lunch before we went to the mall. Got to make sure my growing girls get enough to eat." She hadn't even finished speaking as she stepped back into the kitchen, signaling them to follow her.

The three of you followed the delicious smells towards the kitchen. Your eyes went wide as you took in the huge feast before you. Your mother quickly shoved a massive plate into your hands, loaded with food. You and Tabitha looked at each other, both of your faces mirroring the confusion you felt. It was really starting to seem like your mother was actually trying to fatten you up now. Still, you weren't going to turn down delicious food.

Despite having just stuffed yourselves at the restaurant, you couldn't help but load up on the delicious food your mother had made. It was so addicting. It almost felt like you were getting hungrier as you ate. By the time the three of you were finished with the massive meal, your shirt was struggling to cover all of your bloated belly. Lana leaned back in her chair, which creaked dangerously at the large girl. Even Tabitha seemed larger than normal after the meal.

After hardly any time, your mother had you and Lana in her vehicle and you were heading towards the mall, "Well, I guess I know who Heather borrowed those jeans from yesterday." your mother said after riding in silence for a while.

"Yeah, I guess it is kind of obvious." Lana chuckled, rubbing her swollen belly.

"You must have a big appetite, as a girl your age should." Your mother said.

You could help but notice that your mother seemed to be having a hard time keeping her eyes off of Lana's belly. And it wasn't in the disgusted way either. It almost seemed like she was excited at how big Lana was. Though, that was strange considering how firm she usually was about staying thin. Now that you thought about it, she had been looking at you in about the same way since you showed up in Lana's pants. It was almost like anticipation.

"Yeah, my parents are really good about making sure I get enough to eat." Lana said, relaxing in the seat.

"It's nice to see a girl who gets enough to eat." Your mother said, almost to herself, "It would be good if my daughters had your appetite."

The three of you rode the rest of the way in silence. Your mother had brought umbrellas, though Lana seemed to be too big to fit under hers. Still, it did provide her a little reprieve from the chilly deluge. You made your way into the crowded mall, looking around at the numerous shops that lined the walls.

You were surprised when your mother led the way to a plus size store. You knew you were getting chubby, but you didn't think that you'd quite reached the point where you needed this place. Most of the outfits looked like they'd be too big for your body right now.

"This is where I usually do my shopping." Lana whispered to you as you walked through the many displays, "Though, honestly I think they might be too big for you right now."

"Me too."

"Though, it would probably save you money in the long run if you just grew into them." Lana laughed, turning her attention to a shirt that almost looked big enough to be a tent.

You started browsing through the tent like shirts, surprised that they made clothes this big. It would be interesting to get some clothes to grow into, but you weren't even sure that you wanted to get that big yet. Though, a part of you wanted to buy the biggest clothes in the store and aim to eventually fill them. However, it would probably be better just to aim a few sizes bigger than you were now. Still, maybe a compromise somewhere in between would be best. If you did go big, you could always steal Tabitha's clothes for now. She was a couple sizes bigger than you, so her clothes would definitely fit you. And if needs be, Lana might have some old clothes that were too small for her.

You bit your lip, watching Lana look over the massive clothes in front of you. She was so massive. Still, it wasn't like it would be the first time wearing clothes that big. You glanced down at your own bloated belly, hardly seeming like a bump next to your giant friend who jiggled and flowed with every movement she took. Your eyes followed the massive girl as she struggled to move her girth.

Almost instinctively, you found yourself stepping towards the massive clothes feeling the fabric in your hands. It felt just like any other clothes you'd ever worn. Though, it also seemed to be filled with potential. The potential for what you could one day become. You continued chewing your lip as you felt a stirring in your groin. Memories sprang to your mind of all the girls you'd seen online who could easily fill these clothes. They all seemed so happy, and here was Lana, with a big smile on her face as she struggled to find clothes big enough to contain her mass.

Slowly, you took the dark blue shirt off the rack, holding it up to your small body. It almost looked like a dress with abnormally large sleeves and neck next to your mostly thin frame. After all, even though you were starting to plump up, you still wouldn't really call yourself fat. You were just starting to reach the point were you didn't consider girls thin anymore.

"I think that color would look good on you." Lana said, glancing your direction, "Though you'd have to gain a bit of weight for it to really fit you."

You blushed, lowering the massive shirt as you glanced around. Anyone who saw you would probably think you were crazy, or really confused as to the fact that what you were holding wasn't a dress. You breathed a sigh of relief as you spied the empty area around you and Lana.

"I just can't help, but wonder what it would be like to grow into these." You said, raising the shirt back to your body.

"You could always find out." Lana chuckled, "I think you'd look good at that size."

You found yourself blushing more, though this time it wasn't for fear of others seeing you. The way Lana kept eyeing you, made you wonder if she might be seeing more than just a friend. Though, you'd also been wondering how you really felt about Lana. You bit your lip as you looked away from the enormous girl.

"Don't you think I'd look weird in such big clothes though?"

Lana waddled towards you, putting a thick arm around your narrow shoulders, "I think you could make it work."

You shivered at her touch. Her body was warm and soft, seemingly trying to engulf your small body as she pulled you closer. You'd never been this close to her before, but a part of you didn't want her to let go. However, all too quickly, she relinquished her grip on you. You felt unusually cool as you stepped away from the warmth and comfort of her embrace.

You took a deep breath, trying to focus on picking out clothes. You ended up grabbing several of the biggest shirts and pants you could find before going to look for your mother. She was browsing some nice dresses along one wall, looking carefully at a flowery design.

"I think I have what I want." you finally said, gesturing with your armful of massive clothes.

Your mother's eyes went wide for a moment as she saw the clothes you'd picked, though you could also swear she smiled for a moment, "Oh good! I guess that will give you a little room to grow. I'll just be a couple more minutes."

You went back to wait with Lana while your mother finished looking at dresses. You watched the lights reflecting in the tile floor as you walked, your footsteps clicking with each step. Your mother was definitely behaving differently. She had always been so strict about trying to stay thin, though it wasn't like she'd ever really tried to stop either you or Tabitha when you'd started getting fatter. However, now she was acting almost like she wanted you to get fatter. And Tabitha too. Still, maybe she was just trying to be nice after you told her about standing up for Lana. That was definitely a possibility. If so, then it was very likely that she would return to normal soon.

It didn't take too much longer for your mother to finish her own shopping. Even Lana had picked out a couple new clothes as the three of you made your way to the checkout. Your mother took the two of you out to eat on the way home, making sure that you loaded up on food. She then invited Lana to stay for dinner and made a massive dish of lasagna.

The next day at school, you wore one of the outfits that you'd picked out, doing your best to make it look like a dress, and hide the fact that you were wearing a belt just to keep the pants up. Though, it was hard not to notice the strange looks you were getting from your lame attempt to disguise the truth. The shirt was obviously just that, and noticeably too big for you, and the bunched up fabric of the jeans created a weird effect in the shirt. Though, it definitely did a good job of hiding the weight that you'd put on.

Over the next few weeks, you tended to get by with Tabitha's clothes as they seemed more your size now. Though they rapidly seemed to be shrinking. You had expected your mother to lay off of stuffing you to the limit, but as time went on it almost seemed like she was trying harder to fatten you and your sister up. Her efforts were definitely paying off if she was trying to fatten the two of you up as you watched Tabitha starting to balloon up, quickly outgrowing her current size of clothes. Though, you found that you seemed to be gaining on your now definitely fat sister.

It was like it was getting harder not to gain weight as you watched your body growing bigger everyday. You weren't even sure if you could stop if you wanted to as you continued to stuff yourself day in and day out. You mother always made sure that you ate to your absolute limit throughout the day. She seemed to be encouraging you to spend more time with Lana too, who's lazy lifestyle seemed to be rubbing off on you more and more everyday.

You struggled to do up the pants you'd planned to wear for the day, feeling them cutting into your soft belly as you lay back on your bed. It had been almost 6 weeks since your mother's strange change in behavior, and it was definitely starting to show in your body. This had been one of Tabitha's jeans before she outgrew it a couple weeks ago, and it seemed like you weren't far behind as you finally got the button up. You stood up, noticing how your belly folded around the jeans, creating a nice muffin top.

You smiled as you stuck a finger in your deepening belly button, savoring how deep it was starting to feel. Your other hand felt the slight bumps formed by the stretchmarks that were starting to form on the sides of your belly, looking like red streaks through your rounding midsection. Your breasts looked like they were starting to bulge from your bra, a remnant of a smaller you. The fabric of the jeans looked skin tight on your thick thighs as you moved in front of the stand mirror. You had a definite double chin, and you were definitely what you'd call chubby. Even in the massive clothes you'd gotten a few weeks ago it was getting hard to hide your protruding belly. Though it wasn't really like you were trying to hide it. You were definitely getting more confident in your body.

You glanced at your computer, smiling as you saw the reactions to your most recent post. You'd done a weigh in for your followers on the weight gain website that you tended to stick to. You'd been 166 as of this morning, meaning you'd gained almost a pound a day lately. Though from how much you were eating, it didn't really surprise you. However, it did seem like you were starting to slow down as you got bigger. Though that was probably just because your body was requiring more food just to maintain your weight as it had to work harder to move the heavier you around.

You were definitely starting to notice that physical activity was starting to get a bit more difficult. Not to the point of being unbearable, but you were starting to notice the way your belly squished when you bent over. Or how you were a bit more out of breath from activities that had once been simple and easy. Still, you were excited at the changes.

You took one last look at your body in the mirror before continuing to get ready for school. That was one thing that you also noticed. More people were starting to notice your weight gain, and while many of them didn't explicitly say anything you could tell that they were starting to view you differently. Most of them just ignored you, but it seemed like more and more you were starting to be classified as one of the chubby girls. Though that was what you were, you hadn't expected it to happen so fast.

However, you needed to decide where you were going to go from here. Were you going to keep gaining at the rate you were. Or were you happy with your current size for the time being. You could also try to slow down a bit and savor the journey.

Huffing, you managed to raise your body a few inches off the bed before gravity dragged you back down. You tried again, getting a little bit further off the bed this time before failing. Panting, you took a minute to ready yourself before trying again.

You couldn't help smiling at the difficulty you were having. Just yesterday you'd been bragging to Tabitha that you could still get up by yourself just fine, but here you were, struggling just to get off your soft bed. You really were getting huge. You remembered when you could do anything you wanted with hardly any trouble. Now, however, even the simplest things were starting to become difficult.

You rocked yourself back and forth, using your momentum you finally managed to get to your feet. You couldn't help feeling turned on by how out of shape you were getting as you slowly made your way towards the kitchen. As you entered the hall, you could see a light on in the kitchen, and hear the sounds of someone preparing food, though you were sure it was your mother. Tabitha's door was still closed suggesting that she was still asleep, though when she didn't have class to worry about, she seemed to like to sleep in.

Following the delicious smells coming from the kitchen, you made your way downstairs, your heavy footfalls announcing your presence to everyone in the house, though you couldn't really step lightly anymore. Your mouth was salivating before you even turned the corner and entered the kitchen, but what you saw filled your ravenous belly with delight.

The table was laden with the biggest breakfast that you'd ever seen. There were eggs and bacon, pancakes, waffles, and almost every other type of breakfast item all piled high before you. Your mother glanced at you from her position near the stove where she was working on some more bacon.

You mother smiled at you as you entered, "I figured I needed to do a better job of keeping the two of you fed so you won't have to make midnight trips for food anymore, so dig in."

You mumbled a quick thanks as you plodded towards your spot at the table, and sat down heavily. Your chair groaned in protest, but held firm as you began loading up your plate with food. You didn't know how many times you refilled your plate before Tabitha finally arrived at the table rubbing sleep from her eyes, but no matter how much you ate, it seemed like you hardly made a dent in the pile of food.

The two of you sat in relative silence as you feasted to your hearts content. Finally you sat back in your chair patting your full belly. You glanced around the kitchen realizing that your mother had snuck out at some point, leaving the two of you alone to eat. Slowly, you turned your gaze to the pile of empty dishes between you and Tabitha.

You spent the remainder of the day resting and eating the massive meals that your mother kept making for you and your sister. The next day was mostly the same except you went and spent some time with your new boyfriend, though that was still mostly just spent eating the extremely fattening substance that was pumped through the feeding hose. You were a bit surprised that Lana came and joined the two of you for a little while though.

The next couple of weeks went by in much the same fashion, with you and your sister constantly being fed to the point of feeling like you were going to burst. It didn't take long for the constant supply of food to have a noticeable effect on both of you. As the weeks went on you found yourself more and more eager to eat and push your belly to the limit, while Tabitha seemed to be in the same boat. It was getting to the point where you almost couldn't go more than a few minutes without eating or you felt like you were going to starve. Even Tabitha who had seemed mostly indifferent about eating seemed to be making a much more active effort to constantly binge.

You awoke to the familiar smell of breakfast cooking as your belly let out a loud growl of anticipation. You stretched, feeling the weight of your body as you scratched at you soft belly. You lay in bed, trying to get the motivation to begin moving your obese body.

Sighing, you continued to stare at the ceiling as you realized that today was the last day of the winter break. You were definitely going to have to grab some new clothes before you went back to school tomorrow, you thought as you tugged on your overly tight shirt. Both you and Tabitha had definitely gained a lot over the holiday. You more than her, but that wasn't to say her gain wasn't significant. You were sure she was probably the fattest girl in her grade by now, though you were definitely going to be a big contender for that spot in your grade now too.

You glanced at the mountain of a belly that was rising above you as you lay in bed before beginning the long process of getting to your feet. Huffing and puffing, you wiped a bit of sweat from your brow as you finally got out of bed. Now, did you want to go weigh yourself first, or just jump straight into breakfast.

info.brief_description: Heather has always been a thin girl, but she harbors a secret desire to get fat
info.description:
On the surface Heather seems like just an ordinary 16 year old High School student, but she's always felt different than everyone else. While most girls dream of being thin and athletic, Heather has always wondered what it would be like to be fat. Embarrassed with her taboo desire to gain weight, she's always tried to fit in with the thin crowd, however, while on the internet she discovered an entire community of people who loved getting fat and sharing their experiences. Realizing she wasn't alone in her desires, she found a new confidence to indulge that part of her. This story follows her experiences in trying to realize her dream of getting the soft body she's always wanted, and how her life changes based on her decisions.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Please Contribute

- A couple notes about Heather, so we can maintain a consistent personality and story, which isn't to say it might not change as time goes on, but here is the starting point. Heather has one older sister (22), and one younger sister (13). Her mother is a stay at home mom, and her dad makes good money as a programmer, though he is rarely home since his job is so demanding. Her older sister, who's name is Mary, is married and has one child (a son) who is still an infant. Mary has always been a fitness nut, and loves running marathons or other activities. Her younger sister, who's name is Tabitha, loves video games and is fairly lazy. Tabitha has always been a little on the chubby side, though not really fat. However, lately Tabitha has been softening up more as her lack of physical activity and constant snacking have started to catch up with her, though she really doesn't seem to care one way or the other. Heather's mother, has always been plump, however, she's always getting after Tabitha to do more physical activities and pointing out that she's going to get fat if she keeps doing what she's doing. Despite this though, she doesn't do anything to stop the lazy binging, and seems to have an attitude of letting her children make their own choices. Despite wanting to get fat, Heather has always been self conscious about her weight, and even though she's decided to indulge herself, she's still very timid with her weight. She has a couple good friends who are her age. Jill is a slightly chubby girl who loves anime and video games, and is very kind to everyone, despite being bullied when she was younger. Linda is an average girl who is very outgoing and has little sense for personal boundaries.

- This story is focused more on the life of Heather as she begins indulging her desires and the everyday experiences that a fattening girl would go through. Please keep this in mind as you add well written chapters.

- Please keep all gains reasonable for the amount of time that they occur over. There is no magic or rapid expansion as this story aims to be a bit more realistic in scope. That isn't to say that she can't become massive or have breast expansion, but it can't just happen over night or instantly. Any chapters that don't have at least a semblance of realism will be removed.

- Sex is allowed, but please don't focus too much on it. This isn't a story about sex.

- Finally, have fun with this. I hope that this can become a group effort that we all build on and enjoy.
